item.title: How to add a start up message to your server
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

now i carnt egsactly help you but in my source …its got a file called commands where you onbiusly enter commands and i made my command for ::master like this

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 3); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 4); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 5); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 6); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 7); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 8); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 9); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 10); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 11); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 12); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 13); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 14); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 15); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 16); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 17); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 18); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 19); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 20); c.getPA().addSkillXP(14000000, 21); 
		}</blockquote>

hope this helped a,little

item.title: How to add a start up message to your server
item.dc:creator: @devilshot devilshot
item.description:
@devilshot wrote:

okay so what ive done is downloaded a base server and started to add things to it
i logged on before and noticed a start up message to the server at the bottom
it reads
“sM(“Welcome to SysCape Final!”);
sM(“Please visit our forums: *”);
sM(“Type ::rules and ::info for more information about this server”);
sM(”::quests for all quests done…do them manually you’ll gain rewards");
sM(“owner is “skil not kil” respect him, no asking for staff!”);
sM(“New command! ::bigboss with the rarest drops on server! try it now!”);
sM(“Enjoy!”)"
now i have tryed to change it to ::master also works on this server but it isnt working i have saved the file after editing it the file is client.java
so as i said i have saved it and then reopened it and it remains as i saved it but it is still the same start up message any ideas
thanks
devilshot

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a start up message to your server
